TopicTitle: Can't put control surfaces on swept wings

Articles.Content: I want to put elevons on the trailing edge of the swept wings, but I can't. Help?
You need to rotate them to line up. You can use WASDQE or the rotate widget.
You may also need to use Shift plus WASDQE to get them aligned properly. I find it easier with Angle Snap off.
It can also be fixed with the rotate gizmo in the upper left corner of the SPH/VAB window.
If the position just seems to jump around, turn off angle snap if it is on.
Ditto everybody else. Q-D-S-S is the general key-press sequence I wind up using.
